allowed_variants: Creature/artifact/enchantment sources; cost can be 'sacrifice a creature: ...'
disallowed_variants: One-shot sacrifice effects; 'sacrifice as additional cost' only; requires {T} if no untap support
intent: Enable sacrifice on demand without mana or tap timing constraints.
label: Free sacrifice outlet (repeatable)
notes: This is the backbone enabler for aristocrats and many loop proofs.

allowed_variants: Repeatable activated abilities with mana cost
disallowed_variants: Sorcery-speed only if explicitly restricted; one-shot
intent: Enable sacrifice on demand but consumes mana.
label: Sacrifice outlet with mana cost
notes: Lower grade redundancy substitute for free outlets.

intent: Replace token creation with additional tokens.
label: Token doubler / token multiplier
notes: Critical amplifier for Ashling-style token copy creation.
why_it_matters: Separates true token replacement from copy effects.

allowed_variants: Tutor can be conditional if deterministic (CMC, historic, etc.)
disallowed_variants: Top-of-library only unless deck has strong top manipulation
intent: Access a specific artifact backbone (e.g., Sundial).
label: Artifact tutor to hand
notes: Deterministic access satisfaction for artifact keystones.

label: Enchantment tutor to hand
why_it_matters: Deterministic access tool for enchantment keystones.

allowed_variants: Worldly Tutor class (top) is a variant; weighted by top manipulation elsewhere.
label: Creature tutor to hand

allowed_variants: Conditional tutors (MV<=X) allowed but flagged variant
label: Tutor any card to hand
why_it_matters: Strongest access class; impacts bracket/Game Changers counts in your framework.

disallowed_variants: Permanent-only protection with no stack cover
intent: Protect key spells/permanents via stack interaction.
label: Stack protection (counter/protect spell)
notes: Protects engines from removal and stops combos.

intent: Ongoing protection granted by a permanent.
label: Static permanent protection for permanents
notes: Repeatable protection but vulnerable to removal.

allowed_variants: Auto-equip or low equip cost variants
intent: Provide repeatable creature protection via equipment/attachment.
label: Equipment-based creature protection
why_it_matters: Models what you called out: equipment protects creatures.

disallowed_variants: Auras that fall off easily without value
intent: Provide repeatable creature protection via aura.
label: Aura-based creature protection
notes: Repeatable but vulnerable to enchant hate and 2-for-1 risks.

disallowed_variants: Only regrowth of any card with heavy restrictions (MV<=2) as low-grade
label: Artifact recursion/recovery
notes: Supports recovery coverage for artifact keystones.

intent: Terminate turn to dodge delayed triggers and stack.
label: End-the-turn / time stop family
why_it_matters: Backbone unique axis in temporal engines (Sundial).
